title: "EDA Tables"
output:
  pdf_document: default
  html_notebook: default
---

```{r include = F}
# libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(summarytools)
library(emmeans)

# load data
nb <- readRDS("Data/nb.rds")

# load model
mod <- readRDS("reduced_model.RDS")
```

```{r echo = F}
# glucose summary
nb %>%
  select(Glucose) %>%
  descr(stats = c("mean", "sd", "min", "med", "max")) %>%
  tb() %>%
  kable()
```

```{r echo = F}
# tukey comparisons
# nb_tukey <- emmeans(mod, list(pairwise ~ NutritionBar), adjust = "tukey")
# min_tukey <- emmeans(mod, list(pairwise ~ Minutes), adjust = "tukey")
minnb_tukey <- min_tukey <- emmeans(mod, list(pairwise ~ NutritionBar * Minutes), adjust = "tukey")

# kable(nb_tukey$`pairwise differences of NutritionBar`)
# kable(min_tukey$`pairwise differences of Minutes`)
kable(minnb_tukey$`pairwise differences of NutritionBar, Minutes`)
```
